name: Le:Moon
description:
An adventure to change the shape of the sky and bring back the sun.

Unfortunately I couldn't finish in time and had to cut the end. Maybe I will update someday.

Controls: arrow keys, Z and X.

Made for Metroidvania Month 16.

Inspired by : Aria of Sorrow, Hollow knigh and Super Mario bros. 

I followed some tutorials during the development: https://www.youtube.com/c/PotatoImaginato
